      • mergeInto

        public static void mergeInto(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Accumulator<?,?>> target,
                             java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Accumulator<?,?>> toMerge)
        Merge two collections of accumulators. The second will be merged into the first.
        参数:
        target - The collection of accumulators that will be updated
        toMerge - The collection of accumulators that will be merged into the other

      • mergeSingle

      • deserializeAccumulators

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> deserializeAccumulators(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,SerializedValue<java.lang.Object>> serializedAccumulators,
                                                                                       java.lang.ClassLoader loader)
                                                                                throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                                       java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Takes the serialized accumulator results and tries to deserialize them using the provided class loader.
        参数:
        serializedAccumulators - The serialized accumulator results.
        loader - The class loader to use.
        返回:
        The deserialized accumulator results.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
